name: ATOM (Augmenting the On-Scene Medic)
description: VR/AR system developed with Western Michigan University to assist medics in pediatric care. Contributed core AR app logic, backend integration, tablet companion app, and real-time SQL data sync. Reduced medication error rates in testing from ~30% to nearly zero.

name: XPChronicle
description: World of Warcraft addon with 700+ downloads. Tracks XP through in-game graphs and analysis.

name: Freelance Projects
description: 12+ proprietary freelance projects delivered to clients across multiple domains, including automation, data processing, and web apps.
